00036 bool useBullet2CpuSolver = true;

00038 //choice of contact solver
00039 bool gUseJacobi = false;
00040 bool gUseDbvt = false;
00041 bool gDumpContactStats = false;
00042 bool gCalcWorldSpaceAabbOnCpu = false;
00043 bool gUseCalculateOverlappingPairsHost = false;
00044 bool gIntegrateOnCpu = false;

00066 b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline(cl_context ctx,cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue  q,class b3GpuNarrowPhase* narrowphase, class b3GpuBroadphaseInterface* broadphaseSap , struct b3DynamicBvhBroadphase* broadphaseDbvt, const b3Config& config)
00067 {
00068         m_data = new b3GpuRigidBodyPipelineInternalData;
00069         m_data->m_constraintUid=0;
00070         m_data->m_config = config;
00071         m_data->m_context = ctx;
00072         m_data->m_device = device;
00073         m_data->m_queue = q;
00074 
00075         m_data->m_solver = new b3PgsJacobiSolver(true);//new b3PgsJacobiSolver(true);
00076         m_data->m_gpuSolver = new b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver(ctx,device,q,true);//new b3PgsJacobiSolver(true);
00077         
00078         m_data->m_allAabbsGPU = new b3OpenCLArray<b3SapAabb>(ctx,q,config.m_maxConvexBodies);
00079         m_data->m_overlappingPairsGPU = new b3OpenCLArray<b3BroadphasePair>(ctx,q,config.m_maxBroadphasePairs);
00080 
00081         m_data->m_gpuConstraints = new b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuGenericConstraint>(ctx,q);
00082 #ifdef TEST_OTHER_GPU_SOLVER
00083         m_data->m_solver3 = new b3GpuJacobiContactSolver(ctx,device,q,config.m_maxBroadphasePairs);     
00084 #endif //       TEST_OTHER_GPU_SOLVER
00085         
00086         m_data->m_solver2 = new b3GpuPgsContactSolver(ctx,device,q,config.m_maxBroadphasePairs);
00087 
00088         m_data->m_raycaster = new b3GpuRaycast(ctx,device,q);
00089 
00090         
00091         m_data->m_broadphaseDbvt = broadphaseDbvt;
00092         m_data->m_broadphaseSap = broadphaseSap;
00093         m_data->m_narrowphase = narrowphase;
00094         m_data->m_gravity.setValue(0.f,-9.8f,0.f);
00095 
00096         cl_int errNum=0;
00097 
00098         {
00099                 cl_program prog = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString(m_data->m_context,m_data->m_device,integrateKernelCL,&errNum,"",B3_RIGIDBODY_INTEGRATE_PATH);
00100                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00101                 m_data->m_integrateTransformsKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_data->m_context, m_data->m_device,integrateKernelCL, "integrateTransformsKernel",&errNum,prog);
00102                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00103                 clReleaseProgram(prog);
00104         }
00105         {
00106                 cl_program prog = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString(m_data->m_context,m_data->m_device,updateAabbsKernelCL,&errNum,"",B3_RIGIDBODY_UPDATEAABB_PATH);
00107                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00108                 m_data->m_updateAabbsKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_data->m_context, m_data->m_device,updateAabbsKernelCL, "initializeGpuAabbsFull",&errNum,prog);
00109                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00110 
00111 
00112                 m_data->m_clearOverlappingPairsKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_data->m_context, m_data->m_device,updateAabbsKernelCL, "clearOverlappingPairsKernel",&errNum,prog);
00113                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00114 
00115                 clReleaseProgram(prog);
00116         }
00117 
00118 
00119 }
00120 
00121 b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::~b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline()
00122 {
00123         if (m_data->m_integrateTransformsKernel)
00124                 clReleaseKernel(m_data->m_integrateTransformsKernel);
00125         
00126         if (m_data->m_updateAabbsKernel)
00127                 clReleaseKernel(m_data->m_updateAabbsKernel);
00128         
00129         if (m_data->m_clearOverlappingPairsKernel)
00130                 clReleaseKernel(m_data->m_clearOverlappingPairsKernel);
00131         delete m_data->m_raycaster;
00132         delete m_data->m_solver;
00133         delete m_data->m_allAabbsGPU;
00134         delete m_data->m_gpuConstraints;
00135         delete m_data->m_overlappingPairsGPU;
00136 
00137 #ifdef TEST_OTHER_GPU_SOLVER
00138         delete m_data->m_solver3;
00139 #endif //TEST_OTHER_GPU_SOLVER
00140         
00141         delete m_data->m_solver2;
00142         
00143         
00144         delete m_data;
00145 }
00146 
00147 void    b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::reset()
00148 {
00149         m_data->m_gpuConstraints->resize(0);
00150         m_data->m_cpuConstraints.resize(0);
00151         m_data->m_allAabbsGPU->resize(0);
00152         m_data->m_allAabbsCPU.resize(0);
00153 }
00154 
00155 void    b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::addConstraint(b3TypedConstraint* constraint)
00156 {
00157         m_data->m_joints.push_back(constraint);
00158 }
00159 
00160 void    b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::removeConstraint(b3TypedConstraint* constraint)
00161 {
00162         m_data->m_joints.remove(constraint);
00163 }

00166 
00167 void  b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::removeConstraintByUid(int uid)
00168 {
00169         m_data->m_gpuSolver->recomputeBatches();
00170         //slow linear search
00171         m_data->m_gpuConstraints->copyToHost(m_data->m_cpuConstraints);
00172         //remove
00173         for (int i=0;i<m_data->m_cpuConstraints.size();i++)
00174         {
00175                 if (m_data->m_cpuConstraints[i].m_uid == uid)
00176                 {
00177                         //m_data->m_cpuConstraints.remove(m_data->m_cpuConstraints[i]);
00178                         m_data->m_cpuConstraints.swap(i,m_data->m_cpuConstraints.size()-1);
00179                         m_data->m_cpuConstraints.pop_back();
00180 
00181                         break;
00182                 }
00183         }
00184 
00185         if (m_data->m_cpuConstraints.size())
00186         {
00187                 m_data->m_gpuConstraints->copyFromHost(m_data->m_cpuConstraints);
00188         } else
00189         {
00190                 m_data->m_gpuConstraints->resize(0);
00191         }
00192 
00193 }
00194 int b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::createPoint2PointConstraint(int bodyA, int bodyB, const float* pivotInA, const float* pivotInB,float breakingThreshold)
00195 {
00196         m_data->m_gpuSolver->recomputeBatches();
00197         b3GpuGenericConstraint c;
00198         c.m_uid = m_data->m_constraintUid;
00199         m_data->m_constraintUid++;
00200         c.m_flags = B3_CONSTRAINT_FLAG_ENABLED;
00201         c.m_rbA = bodyA;
00202         c.m_rbB = bodyB;
00203         c.m_pivotInA.setValue(pivotInA[0],pivotInA[1],pivotInA[2]);
00204         c.m_pivotInB.setValue(pivotInB[0],pivotInB[1],pivotInB[2]);
00205         c.m_breakingImpulseThreshold = breakingThreshold;
00206         c.m_constraintType = B3_GPU_POINT2POINT_CONSTRAINT_TYPE;
00207         m_data->m_cpuConstraints.push_back(c);
00208         return c.m_uid;
00209 }
00210 int b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::createFixedConstraint(int bodyA, int bodyB, const float* pivotInA, const float* pivotInB, const float* relTargetAB,float breakingThreshold)
00211 {
00212         m_data->m_gpuSolver->recomputeBatches();
00213         b3GpuGenericConstraint c;
00214         c.m_uid = m_data->m_constraintUid;
00215         m_data->m_constraintUid++;
00216         c.m_flags = B3_CONSTRAINT_FLAG_ENABLED;
00217         c.m_rbA = bodyA;
00218         c.m_rbB = bodyB;
00219         c.m_pivotInA.setValue(pivotInA[0],pivotInA[1],pivotInA[2]);
00220         c.m_pivotInB.setValue(pivotInB[0],pivotInB[1],pivotInB[2]);
00221         c.m_relTargetAB.setValue(relTargetAB[0],relTargetAB[1],relTargetAB[2],relTargetAB[3]);
00222         c.m_breakingImpulseThreshold = breakingThreshold;
00223         c.m_constraintType = B3_GPU_FIXED_CONSTRAINT_TYPE;
00224 
00225         m_data->m_cpuConstraints.push_back(c);
00226         return c.m_uid;
00227 }

00229 
00230 void    b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::stepSimulation(float deltaTime)
00231 {
00232 
00233         //update worldspace AABBs from local AABB/worldtransform
00234         {
00235                 B3_PROFILE("setupGpuAabbs");
00236                 setupGpuAabbsFull();
00237         }
00238 
00239         int numPairs =0;
00240 
00241         //compute overlapping pairs
00242         {
00243 
00244                 if (gUseDbvt)
00245                 {
00246                         {
00247                                 B3_PROFILE("setAabb");
00248                                 m_data->m_allAabbsGPU->copyToHost(m_data->m_allAabbsCPU);
00249                                 for (int i=0;i<m_data->m_allAabbsCPU.size();i++)
00250                                 {
00251                                         b3Vector3 aabbMin=b3MakeVector3(m_data->m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_min[0],m_data->m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_min[1],m_data->m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_min[2]);
00252                                         b3Vector3 aabbMax=b3MakeVector3(m_data->m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_max[0],m_data->m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_max[1],m_data->m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_max[2]);
00253                                         m_data->m_broadphaseDbvt->setAabb(i,aabbMin,aabbMax,0);
00254                                 }
00255                         }
00256 
00257                         {
00258                                 B3_PROFILE("calculateOverlappingPairs");
00259                                 m_data->m_broadphaseDbvt->calculateOverlappingPairs();
00260                         }
00261                         numPairs = m_data->m_broadphaseDbvt->getOverlappingPairCache()->getNumOverlappingPairs();
00262 
00263                 } else
00264                 {
00265                         if (gUseCalculateOverlappingPairsHost)
00266                         {
00267                                 m_data->m_broadphaseSap->calculateOverlappingPairsHost(m_data->m_config.m_maxBroadphasePairs);
00268                         } else
00269                         {
00270                                 m_data->m_broadphaseSap->calculateOverlappingPairs(m_data->m_config.m_maxBroadphasePairs);
00271                         }
00272                         numPairs = m_data->m_broadphaseSap->getNumOverlap();
00273                 }
00274         }
00275 
00276         //compute contact points
00277 //      printf("numPairs=%d\n",numPairs);
00278         
00279         int numContacts  = 0;
00280 
00281 
00282         int numBodies = m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumRigidBodies();
00283 
00284         if (numPairs)
00285         {
00286                 cl_mem pairs =0;
00287                 cl_mem aabbsWS =0;
00288                 if (gUseDbvt)
00289                 {
00290                         B3_PROFILE("m_overlappingPairsGPU->copyFromHost");
00291                         m_data->m_overlappingPairsGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_broadphaseDbvt->getOverlappingPairCache()->getOverlappingPairArray());
00292                         pairs = m_data->m_overlappingPairsGPU->getBufferCL();
00293                         aabbsWS = m_data->m_allAabbsGPU->getBufferCL();
00294                 } else
00295                 {
00296                         pairs = m_data->m_broadphaseSap->getOverlappingPairBuffer();
00297                         aabbsWS = m_data->m_broadphaseSap->getAabbBufferWS();
00298                 }
00299 
00300                 m_data->m_overlappingPairsGPU->resize(numPairs);
00301 
00302                 //mark the contacts for each pair as 'unused'
00303                 if (numPairs)
00304                 {
00305                         b3OpenCLArray<b3BroadphasePair> gpuPairs(this->m_data->m_context,m_data->m_queue);
00306                         gpuPairs.setFromOpenCLBuffer(pairs,numPairs);
00307 
00308                         if (gClearPairsOnGpu)
00309                         {
00310                                 
00311 
00312                                 //b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BroadphasePair> hostPairs;//just for debugging
00313                                 //gpuPairs.copyToHost(hostPairs);
00314 
00315                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_data->m_queue,m_data->m_clearOverlappingPairsKernel,"clearOverlappingPairsKernel");
00316                                 launcher.setBuffer(pairs);
00317                                 launcher.setConst(numPairs);
00318                                 launcher.launch1D(numPairs);
00319 
00320 
00321                                 //gpuPairs.copyToHost(hostPairs);
00322                         
00323 
00324                         } else
00325                         {
00326                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BroadphasePair> hostPairs;
00327                                 gpuPairs.copyToHost(hostPairs);
00328 
00329                                 for (int i=0;i<hostPairs.size();i++)
00330                                 {
00331                                         hostPairs[i].z = 0xffffffff;
00332                                 }
00333 
00334                                 gpuPairs.copyFromHost(hostPairs);
00335                         }
00336                 }
00337 
00338                 m_data->m_narrowphase->computeContacts(pairs,numPairs,aabbsWS,numBodies);
00339                 numContacts = m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumContactsGpu();
00340 
00341                 if (gUseDbvt)
00342                 {
00344                         B3_PROFILE("m_overlappingPairsGPU->copyToHost");
00345                         m_data->m_overlappingPairsGPU->copyToHost(m_data->m_broadphaseDbvt->getOverlappingPairCache()->getOverlappingPairArray());
00346                 }
00347                 if (gDumpContactStats && numContacts)
00348                 {
00349                         m_data->m_narrowphase->getContactsGpu();
00350                         
00351                         printf("numContacts = %d\n", numContacts);
00352 
00353                         int totalPoints  = 0;
00354                         const b3Contact4* contacts = m_data->m_narrowphase->getContactsCPU();
00355 
00356                         for (int i=0;i<numContacts;i++)
00357                         {
00358                                 totalPoints += contacts->getNPoints();
00359                         }
00360                         printf("totalPoints=%d\n",totalPoints);
00361 
00362                 }
00363         }
00364         
00365 
00366         //convert contact points to contact constraints
00367         
00368         //solve constraints
00369 
00370         b3OpenCLArray<b3RigidBodyData> gpuBodies(m_data->m_context,m_data->m_queue,0,true);
00371         gpuBodies.setFromOpenCLBuffer(m_data->m_narrowphase->getBodiesGpu(),m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumRigidBodies());
00372         b3OpenCLArray<b3InertiaData> gpuInertias(m_data->m_context,m_data->m_queue,0,true);
00373         gpuInertias.setFromOpenCLBuffer(m_data->m_narrowphase->getBodyInertiasGpu(),m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumRigidBodies());
00374         b3OpenCLArray<b3Contact4> gpuContacts(m_data->m_context,m_data->m_queue,0,true);
00375         gpuContacts.setFromOpenCLBuffer(m_data->m_narrowphase->getContactsGpu(),m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumContactsGpu());
00376 
00377         int numJoints =  m_data->m_joints.size() ?  m_data->m_joints.size() : m_data->m_cpuConstraints.size();
00378         if (useBullet2CpuSolver && numJoints)
00379         {
00380 
00381         //      b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4> hostContacts;
00382                 //gpuContacts.copyToHost(hostContacts);
00383                 {
00384                         bool useGpu = m_data->m_joints.size()==0;
00385 
00386 //                      b3Contact4* contacts = numContacts? &hostContacts[0]: 0;
00387                         //m_data->m_solver->solveContacts(m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumBodiesGpu(),&hostBodies[0],&hostInertias[0],numContacts,contacts,numJoints, joints);
00388                         if (useGpu)
00389                         {
00390                                 m_data->m_gpuSolver->solveJoints(m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumRigidBodies(),&gpuBodies,&gpuInertias,numJoints, m_data->m_gpuConstraints);
00391                         } else
00392                         {
00393                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData> hostBodies;
00394                                 gpuBodies.copyToHost(hostBodies);
00395                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3InertiaData> hostInertias;
00396                                 gpuInertias.copyToHost(hostInertias);
00397 
00398                                 b3TypedConstraint** joints = numJoints? &m_data->m_joints[0] : 0;
00399                                 m_data->m_solver->solveContacts(m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumRigidBodies(),&hostBodies[0],&hostInertias[0],0,0,numJoints, joints);
00400                                 gpuBodies.copyFromHost(hostBodies);
00401                         }
00402                 }
00403         }
00404 
00405         if (numContacts)
00406         {
00407 
00408 #ifdef TEST_OTHER_GPU_SOLVER
00409                 
00410                 if (gUseJacobi)
00411                 {
00412                         bool useGpu = true;
00413                         if (useGpu)
00414                         {
00415 
00416                                 bool forceHost = false;
00417                                 if (forceHost)
00418                                 {
00419                                         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData> hostBodies;
00420                                         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3InertiaData> hostInertias;
00421                                         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4> hostContacts;
00422                                 
00423                                         {
00424                                                 B3_PROFILE("copyToHost");
00425                                                 gpuBodies.copyToHost(hostBodies);
00426                                                 gpuInertias.copyToHost(hostInertias);
00427                                                 gpuContacts.copyToHost(hostContacts);
00428                                         }
00429 
00430                                         {
00431                                                 b3JacobiSolverInfo solverInfo;
00432                                                 m_data->m_solver3->solveGroupHost(&hostBodies[0], &hostInertias[0], hostBodies.size(),&hostContacts[0],hostContacts.size(),solverInfo);
00433 
00434                                                 
00435                                         }
00436                                         {
00437                                                 B3_PROFILE("copyFromHost");
00438                                                 gpuBodies.copyFromHost(hostBodies);
00439                                         }
00440                                 } else
00441 
00442 
00443                                 {
00444                                         int static0Index = m_data->m_narrowphase->getStatic0Index();
00445                                         b3JacobiSolverInfo solverInfo;
00446                                         //m_data->m_solver3->solveContacts(    >solveGroup(&gpuBodies, &gpuInertias, &gpuContacts,solverInfo);
00447                                         //m_data->m_solver3->solveContacts(m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumBodiesGpu(),&hostBodies[0],&hostInertias[0],numContacts,&hostContacts[0]);
00448                                         m_data->m_solver3->solveContacts(numBodies, gpuBodies.getBufferCL(),gpuInertias.getBufferCL(),numContacts, gpuContacts.getBufferCL(),m_data->m_config, static0Index);
00449                                 }
00450                         } else
00451                         {
00452                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RigidBodyData> hostBodies;
00453                                 gpuBodies.copyToHost(hostBodies);
00454                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3InertiaData> hostInertias;
00455                                 gpuInertias.copyToHost(hostInertias);
00456                                 b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Contact4> hostContacts;
00457                                 gpuContacts.copyToHost(hostContacts);
00458                                 {
00459                                         //m_data->m_solver->solveContacts(m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumBodiesGpu(),&hostBodies[0],&hostInertias[0],numContacts,&hostContacts[0]);
00460                                 }
00461                                 gpuBodies.copyFromHost(hostBodies);
00462                         }
00463                 
00464                 } else
00465 #endif //TEST_OTHER_GPU_SOLVER
00466                 {
00467                         
00468                         int static0Index = m_data->m_narrowphase->getStatic0Index();
00469                         m_data->m_solver2->solveContacts(numBodies, gpuBodies.getBufferCL(),gpuInertias.getBufferCL(),numContacts, gpuContacts.getBufferCL(),m_data->m_config, static0Index);
00470                         
00471                         //m_data->m_solver4->solveContacts(m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumBodiesGpu(), gpuBodies.getBufferCL(), gpuInertias.getBufferCL(), numContacts, gpuContacts.getBufferCL());
00472                         
00473                         
00474                         /*m_data->m_solver3->solveContactConstraintHost(
00475                         (b3OpenCLArray<RigidBodyBase::Body>*)&gpuBodies,
00476                         (b3OpenCLArray<RigidBodyBase::Inertia>*)&gpuInertias,
00477                         (b3OpenCLArray<Constraint4>*) &gpuContacts,
00478                         0,numContacts,256);
00479                         */
00480                 }
00481         }
00482 
00483         integrate(deltaTime);
00484 
00485 }
00486 
00487 
00488 void    b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::integrate(float timeStep)
00489 {
00490         //integrate
00491         int numBodies = m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumRigidBodies();
00492         float angularDamp = 0.99f;
00493 
00494         if (gIntegrateOnCpu)
00495         {
00496                 if(numBodies)
00497                 {
00498                         b3GpuNarrowPhaseInternalData*   npData = m_data->m_narrowphase->getInternalData();
00499                         npData->m_bodyBufferGPU->copyToHost(*npData->m_bodyBufferCPU);
00500 
00501                         b3RigidBodyData_t* bodies = &npData->m_bodyBufferCPU->at(0);
00502 
00503                         for (int nodeID=0;nodeID<numBodies;nodeID++)
00504                         {
00505                                 integrateSingleTransform( bodies,nodeID, timeStep, angularDamp, m_data->m_gravity);
00506                         }
00507                         npData->m_bodyBufferGPU->copyFromHost(*npData->m_bodyBufferCPU);
00508                 }
00509         } else
00510         {
00511                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_data->m_queue,m_data->m_integrateTransformsKernel,"m_integrateTransformsKernel");
00512                 launcher.setBuffer(m_data->m_narrowphase->getBodiesGpu());
00513                 
00514                 launcher.setConst(numBodies);
00515                 launcher.setConst(timeStep);
00516                 launcher.setConst(angularDamp);
00517                 launcher.setConst(m_data->m_gravity);
00518                 launcher.launch1D(numBodies);
00519         }
00520 }
00521 
00522

00524 
00525 void    b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::setupGpuAabbsFull()
00526 {
00527         cl_int ciErrNum=0;
00528 
00529         int numBodies = m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumRigidBodies();
00530         if (!numBodies)
00531                 return;
00532 
00533         if (gCalcWorldSpaceAabbOnCpu)
00534         {
00535                 
00536                 if (numBodies)
00537                 {
00538                         if (gUseDbvt)
00539                         {
00540                                 m_data->m_allAabbsCPU.resize(numBodies);
00541                                 m_data->m_narrowphase->readbackAllBodiesToCpu();
00542                                 for (int i=0;i<numBodies;i++)
00543                                 {
00544                                         b3ComputeWorldAabb(  i, m_data->m_narrowphase->getBodiesCpu(), m_data->m_narrowphase->getCollidablesCpu(), m_data->m_narrowphase->getLocalSpaceAabbsCpu(),&m_data->m_allAabbsCPU[0]);
00545                                 }
00546                                 m_data->m_allAabbsGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_allAabbsCPU);
00547                         } else
00548                         {
00549                                 m_data->m_broadphaseSap->getAllAabbsCPU().resize(numBodies);
00550                                 m_data->m_narrowphase->readbackAllBodiesToCpu();
00551                                 for (int i=0;i<numBodies;i++)
00552                                 {
00553                                         b3ComputeWorldAabb(  i, m_data->m_narrowphase->getBodiesCpu(), m_data->m_narrowphase->getCollidablesCpu(), m_data->m_narrowphase->getLocalSpaceAabbsCpu(),&m_data->m_broadphaseSap->getAllAabbsCPU()[0]);
00554                                 }
00555                                 m_data->m_broadphaseSap->getAllAabbsGPU().copyFromHost(m_data->m_broadphaseSap->getAllAabbsCPU());
00556                                 //m_data->m_broadphaseSap->writeAabbsToGpu();
00557                         }
00558                 }
00559         } else
00560         {
00561                 //__kernel void initializeGpuAabbsFull(  const int numNodes, __global Body* gBodies,__global Collidable* collidables, __global b3AABBCL* plocalShapeAABB, __global b3AABBCL* pAABB)
00562                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_data->m_queue,m_data->m_updateAabbsKernel,"m_updateAabbsKernel");
00563                 launcher.setConst(numBodies);
00564                 cl_mem bodies = m_data->m_narrowphase->getBodiesGpu();
00565                 launcher.setBuffer(bodies);
00566                 cl_mem collidables = m_data->m_narrowphase->getCollidablesGpu();
00567                 launcher.setBuffer(collidables);
00568                 cl_mem localAabbs = m_data->m_narrowphase->getAabbLocalSpaceBufferGpu();
00569                 launcher.setBuffer(localAabbs);
00570 
00571                 cl_mem worldAabbs =0;
00572                 if (gUseDbvt)
00573                 {
00574                         worldAabbs = m_data->m_allAabbsGPU->getBufferCL();
00575                 } else
00576                 {
00577                         worldAabbs = m_data->m_broadphaseSap->getAabbBufferWS();
00578                 }
00579                 launcher.setBuffer(worldAabbs);
00580                 launcher.launch1D(numBodies);
00581         
00582                 oclCHECKERROR(ciErrNum, CL_SUCCESS);
00583         }
00584 
00585         /*
00586         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3SapAabb> aabbs;
00587         m_data->m_broadphaseSap->m_allAabbsGPU.copyToHost(aabbs);
00588 
00589         printf("numAabbs = %d\n",  aabbs.size());
00590 
00591         for (int i=0;i<aabbs.size();i++)
00592         {
00593                 printf("aabb[%d].m_min=%f,%f,%f,%d\n",i,aabbs[i].m_minVec[0],aabbs[i].m_minVec[1],aabbs[i].m_minVec[2],aabbs[i].m_minIndices[3]);
00594                 printf("aabb[%d].m_max=%f,%f,%f,%d\n",i,aabbs[i].m_maxVec[0],aabbs[i].m_maxVec[1],aabbs[i].m_maxVec[2],aabbs[i].m_signedMaxIndices[3]);
00595 
00596         };
00597         */
00598 
00599         
00600 
00601 
00602 
00603 }

00632 
00633 
00634 int             b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::registerPhysicsInstance(float mass, const float* position, const float* orientation, int collidableIndex, int userIndex, bool writeInstanceToGpu)
00635 {
00636         
00637         b3Vector3 aabbMin=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0),aabbMax=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00638 
00639         
00640         if (collidableIndex>=0)
00641         {
00642                 b3SapAabb localAabb = m_data->m_narrowphase->getLocalSpaceAabb(collidableIndex);
00643                 b3Vector3 localAabbMin=b3MakeVector3(localAabb.m_min[0],localAabb.m_min[1],localAabb.m_min[2]);
00644                 b3Vector3 localAabbMax=b3MakeVector3(localAabb.m_max[0],localAabb.m_max[1],localAabb.m_max[2]);
00645                 
00646                 b3Scalar margin = 0.01f;
00647                 b3Transform t;
00648                 t.setIdentity();
00649                 t.setOrigin(b3MakeVector3(position[0],position[1],position[2]));
00650                 t.setRotation(b3Quaternion(orientation[0],orientation[1],orientation[2],orientation[3]));
00651                 b3TransformAabb(localAabbMin,localAabbMax, margin,t,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00652         } else
00653         {
00654                 b3Error("registerPhysicsInstance using invalid collidableIndex\n");
00655                 return -1;
00656         }
00657                         
00658         
00659         bool writeToGpu = false;
00660         int bodyIndex = m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumRigidBodies();
00661         bodyIndex = m_data->m_narrowphase->registerRigidBody(collidableIndex,mass,position,orientation,&aabbMin.getX(),&aabbMax.getX(),writeToGpu);
00662 
00663         if (bodyIndex>=0)
00664         {
00665                 if (gUseDbvt)
00666                 {
00667                         m_data->m_broadphaseDbvt->createProxy(aabbMin,aabbMax,bodyIndex,0,1,1);
00668                         b3SapAabb aabb;
00669                         for (int i=0;i<3;i++)
00670                         {
00671                                 aabb.m_min[i] = aabbMin[i];
00672                                 aabb.m_max[i] = aabbMax[i];
00673                                 aabb.m_minIndices[3] = bodyIndex;
00674                         }
00675                         m_data->m_allAabbsCPU.push_back(aabb);
00676                         if (writeInstanceToGpu)
00677                         {
00678                                 m_data->m_allAabbsGPU->copyFromHost(m_data->m_allAabbsCPU);
00679                         }
00680                 } else
00681                 {
00682                         if (mass)
00683                         {
00684                                 m_data->m_broadphaseSap->createProxy(aabbMin,aabbMax,bodyIndex,1,1);//m_dispatcher);
00685                         } else
00686                         {
00687                                 m_data->m_broadphaseSap->createLargeProxy(aabbMin,aabbMax,bodyIndex,1,1);//m_dispatcher);       
00688                         }
00689                 }
00690         }
00691 
00692         /*
00693         if (mass>0.f)
00694                 m_numDynamicPhysicsInstances++;
00695 
00696         m_numPhysicsInstances++;
00697         */
00698 
00699         return bodyIndex;
00700 }
00701 
00702 void    b3GpuRigidBodyPipeline::castRays(const b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RayInfo>& rays,   b3AlignedObjectArray<b3RayHit>& hitResults)
00703 {
00704         this->m_data->m_raycaster->castRays(rays,hitResults,
00705                 getNumBodies(),this->m_data->m_narrowphase->getBodiesCpu(),
00706                 m_data->m_narrowphase->getNumCollidablesGpu(), m_data->m_narrowphase->getCollidablesCpu(),
00707                 m_data->m_narrowphase->getInternalData(), m_data->m_broadphaseSap);
00708 }
